channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: MAGA conspiracy machine steers Trump team's Kirk investigation
item.description: MAGA activists are demanding real-world retribution for Charlie Kirk's assassination , dragging their allies in government down a rabbit hole of onlin...

item.title: AI "workslop" is crushing workplace efficiency, study finds
item.description: AI is supposed to make work easier, but instead it has generated a new problem: "workslop." Why it matters: The term, coined by researchers in the lat...

item.title: "Own goal": How Gabbard damaged the Trump admin's probe into ex-spy chief
item.description: The Justice Department's criminal probe of ex-spy chief John Brennan hit a big roadblock after Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard withdre...

item.title: Where America's oldest residents live
item.description: Data: U.S. Census Bureau ; Map: Alex Fitzpatrick/Axios The number of centenarians — people aged 100 or older — in the U.S. grew by 50% from the 2010 C...

item.title: The Pentagon's bunker mentality
item.description: The Pentagon is clamping down on press access while simultaneously restricting where, when and how the military and civilian officials engage with the...

item.title: In Wisconsin swing district, criticism of Charlie Kirk sparks backlash
item.description: The tensions coursing through the country have been on stark display, as a teacher and two city council members face a backlash over their words.

item.title: No more 'wimpy politics’: Van Hollen pushes Dems to get off the sidelines
item.description: “This job is not worth it if you constantly have to be putting your finger to the wind,” said Van Hollen (D), the Maryland senator, in a recent interv...

item.title: Trump administration eyes USAID money to advance America First goals
item.description: A State Department plan to reallocate close to $2 billion in foreign aid marks the latest challenge to Congress’ authority over federal spending.

item.title: Republican wins special election in Georgia, as Democrat makes gains
item.description: Party strategists were watching the state Senate vote in a ruby red district for some clues about voter attitudes ahead of the midterms.

item.title: Democrats further narrow GOP’s House majority with Arizona special election win
item.description: Adelita Grijalva is the projected winner of the race to fill her father’s congressional seat, trimming a Republican House majority that was already hi...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
